and sends it to the server encrypted with the server's public key however
there's a huge difference between the SSL protocol and the s7 p3 handshake and
the difference is that in SSL each server has its unique private public
keeper whereas in the s7 p3 handshake opions is from the same model and the
same framework version share a single private public key per the implication
